field.name: summary
field.value: No ability to set DateTime input formatting

field.name: description
field.value:
DateTime input formatting in scaffolding views seems to be hardcoded to MM/DD/YY. This is a problem for countries which use other formats, like Germany which uses DD/MM/YY. It would be great to have a way, to set them by yourself.
http://fisheye2.atlassian.com/browse/castleproject/trunk/MonoRail/Castle.MonoRail.ActiveRecordSupport/Scaffold/Helpers/ARFormHelper.cs?r=4760#l430
http://forum.castleproject.org/viewtopic.php?t=5059&start=0&postdays=0&postorder=asc&highlight
PS: This is my first bug report, so please tell me, if I made any mistakes ...
